Name: Coconut Milk Corned Beef and Cabbage
Description: An exotic twist on an old classic, this corned beef and cabbage is braised in coconut milk, giving it a subtle sweetness and richness that is delightful.
Author: Chef John

Name: Beef, Mushroom and Guinness(R) Pie
Description: Beef, mushrooms, and Irish stout beer simmer into a savory filling for a pot pie topped with puff pastry.
Author: Melanie Booth

Name: Easy Corned Beef and Cabbage
Description: This corned beef and cabbage recipe is quick and easy. A no-fuss meal, that's great for St. Patrick's Day or a weeknight family dinner.
Author: Trisheee

Name: Crispy Chicken Nuggets
Description: Homemade crispy chicken nuggets made with a crispy rice cereal coating are a quick and easy meal your kids will love. Serve with apricot preserves.
Author: Bryon Dean Thomas

Name: Virgil's \Top Secret\ Pork Chop Marinade
Description: This marinade with Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, and vinegar is intended for pork chops, but also works on beef and chicken.
Author: duboo

Name: Coconut Crust
Description: You might want to forget the filling and just munch on the fabulous coconut crust. And it 's so simple to make. Coconut and melted butter are combined and pressed into the bottom of a 9-inch pie plate. Bake for 15 minutes, cool and fill with your favorite pie stuff.
Author: Carol

Name: Slow Cooker Thai Curried Beef
Description: Beef is simmered with coconut milk, red curry paste, and spinach in this Thai-inspired slow cooker recipe that's as tasty as it is forgiving.
Author: Sapper26

Name: Luck o' the Irish Brownie
Description: This decadent brownie is perfect for a St. Patrick's day celebration full of green!
Author: Cher

Name: Potato Scones
Description: These potato scones are the perfect side with any breakfast meal and are sure to become a family favorite!
Author: Lindsay O.

Name: Big Kids' Watermelon
Description: Watermelon is marinated with spiced rum in this adults-only addition to the picnic table, a refreshing appetizer or dessert in the summer.
Author: Raiderking

Name: Spaghetti Alla Carbonara Tradizionali
Description: This traditional spaghetti alla carbonara uses guanciale, eggs, and Pecorino-Romano cheese for an authentic Italian meal everyone loves.
Author: Andry008

Name: Watermelon Chutney
Description: Watermelon chutney, made with tomatoes, red onion, red pepper, and curry powder is a great addition to sandwiches or as a side with meat.
Author: tokonoma

Name: Baek Kimchi (White Kimchi)
Description: Homemade baek kimchi (white kimchi), a Korean staple, is easy to make at home using napa cabbage, daikon radish, garlic, and vinegar.
Author: Ann Lee

Name: Lasagne Alla Bolognese Saporite
Description: This lasagne alla Bolognese is a rich version of lasagna with a homemade white sauce, red wine, and spices, creating an Italian feast.
Author: alemarsi

Name: Gluten-Free Pizza Crust or Flatbread
Description: Make your own gluten-free dough for pizza crusts or flatbreads using this straightforward, family-friendly recipe ready in 1 hour.
Author: Allen Seidman

Name: Best Banana Yogurt Bread
Description: This delicious quick bread gets an extra boost of flavor from banana-flavored yogurt, and using sliced bananas gives it a lighter texture.
Author: betsysmom

Name: Date, Almond, and Yogurt Bread
Description: This sweet quick bread with chopped dates, slivered almonds, and a hint of nutmeg has a moist texture thanks to whole milk yogurt.
Author: EasterBunny

Name: Deconstructed California Roll Bowl
Description: Teriyaki chicken, vegetables, and avocado are served over short-grain rice in these bowls in a deconstructed version of California rolls.
Author: KAZOOT

Name: Egg Roll Bowl
Description: Pork sausage, coleslaw mix, soy sauce, and sesame oil are cooked together to recreate the flavors of an egg roll in this breakfast bowl.
Author: Chuck

Name: Coconut and Molasses-Filled Rice Dumplings
Description: These steamed rice dumplings filled with coconut and molasses are a popular dessert from Kerala, India that are also a fun afterschool snack.
Author: Sreeja

Name: Almond Burfi
Description: Almonds, sugar, milk, and cardamom are blended and formed into small sweet bites called almond burfi, a treat for Holi, a Hindu holiday.
Author: tastebudart

Name: Sawine (Vermicelli Kheer)
Description: Sawine is a Trinidadian/Indian noodle pudding made with raisins, cinnamon, and almonds.
Author: Pixie2

Name: Tofu Nuggets with Maple-Mustard Dipping Sauce
Description: Extra-firm tofu and breading give these nuggets the texture of real chicken, and the sauce is just a yummy bonus.
Author: isachandra

Name: Lentil Tacos
Description: This vegan version of classic tacos uses lentils instead of ground beef, along with other flavors so good you'll never miss the meat!
Author: isachandra

Name: Sandy's Tzimmes
Description: Small-dice glazed carrots with ginger are simmered with prunes in this traditional Jewish recipe. One translation of "tzimmes" is "a big fuss," but this simple recipe is anything but.
Author: SandyG

Name: Chopped Power Salad
Description: Chopped cauliflower, broccoli, and carrots are tossed with fresh herbs and garlic, golden raisins, toasted pumpkin seeds, olive oil, and cider vinegar.
Author: NickiSizemore

Name: Pretty Darn Quick Potato Gratin
Description: Use your food processor for shredding and slicing to cut the prep time of this quick potato gratin with Gruyere cheese and a hint of nutmeg.
Author: NickiSizemore

Name: Spicy Mezcal Margarita
Description: Hot peppers and mezcal, a smokier version of tequila, make this spicy margarita the perfect summer cocktail.
Author: GoodFoodStories

Name: Tuscan Skirt Steak with Salsa Verde
Description: Skirt steak with a Tuscan-inspired marinade is grilled and served with a Mediterrean-style salsa. Use your food processor to quickly prep this delicious savory dish.
Author: NickiSizemore
